page.title: 07Tourism in Eastchurch
page.content: {Caravan sites}are an important aspect of{tourism}in Eastchurch so we decided to interview a caravan owner as to why he had selected this area to buy a caravan. He informed us that he had paid Â£4,500 for his sited{caravan}and a further Â£350 annually to cover land rental, electricity, water and general maintainance. His main criteria for selecting this site was that it would provide a peaceful weekend retreat from which he could go sightseeing. The{beach}at Leysdown is also easily accessible. From here he is able to visit local pubs and restaurants while on the site itself he has the use of their swimming pool. Finally, as he lives at Maidstone, Eastchurch is an ideal distance for short term visits.
